name: Ritium Spot
description:
Ritium Spot

A Rhythm Game made for Fun and to cure the Developer's boredom.

This videogame was made for Yanzhi (spawnkill#0001)

How to Play?

Diamond Clicking Key order - Left Arrow | Down Arrow | Up Arrow  | Right Arrow 

Click the correct diamond when a Coin reaches near it.

Try to get as many Perfects/Hots to get the most Points and try to get fewer Misses

Mouse scroll to increase and decrease speed

How to connect with Spotify?

It will auto-connect to your Spotify on Start and generate coins accordingly, it is, I would say 93% accurate. It is developed by checking pitch and rate. If it isn't that accurate, you can increase and decrease speed to match it using scrolling.

If Spotify isn't open, it will randomly generate tiles [ Not Recommended most of the time ]
